SELECT A_ID, S_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, A_THEME_ID, A_START_DATE, A_END_DATE, A_ADDR, A_NAME, A_ONE_LINER, A_MIN_PEOPLE, A_MAX_PEOPLE, A_CHARGE, S_SITE, A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM (SELECT A_ID, S_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, A_THEME_ID, A_START_DATE, A_END_DATE, A_ADDR, A_NAME, A_ONE_LINER, A_MIN_PEOPLE, A_MAX_PEOPLE, A_CHARGE, S_SITE, A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE A_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchDTO.keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT A_ID, S_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, A_THEME_ID, A_START_DATE, A_END_DATE, A_ADDR, A_NAME, A_ONE_LINER, A_MIN_PEOPLE, A_MAX_PEOPLE, A_CHARGE, S_SITE, A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE A_CHARGE >= #{searchDTO.charge} UNION SELECT A_ID, S_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, A_THEME_ID, A_START_DATE, A_END_DATE, A_ADDR, A_NAME, A_ONE_LINER, A_MIN_PEOPLE, A_MAX_PEOPLE, A_CHARGE, S_SITE, A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE A_THEME_ID=#{searchDTO.theme} UNION SELECT A.A_ID, A.S_ID, A.SIGUNGU_ID, A.A_THEME_ID, A.A_START_DATE, A.A_END_DATE, A.A_ADDR, A.A_NAME, A.A_ONE_LINER, A.A_MIN_PEOPLE, A.A_MAX_PEOPLE, A.A_CHARGE, A.S_SITE, A.A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM ACTIVITY_INFO A INNER JOIN REGION_SIGUNGU R ON A.SIGUNGU_ID = R.SIGUNGU_ID WHERE R.SIDO_ID=#{searchDTO.sido} UNION SELECT A.A_ID, A.S_ID, A.SIGUNGU_ID, A.A_THEME_ID, A.A_START_DATE, A.A_END_DATE, A.A_ADDR, A.A_NAME, A.A_ONE_LINER, A.A_MIN_PEOPLE, A.A_MAX_PEOPLE, A.A_CHARGE, A.S_SITE, A.A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM ACTIVITY_INFO A INNER JOIN REGION_SIGUNGU R ON A.SIGUNGU_ID = R.SIGUNGU_ID WHERE A.SIGUNGU_ID=#{searchDTO.sigungu} ORDER BY A_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPostNo} AND #{endPostNo}
